pageDescription: Learn about our history, mission, vision, and achievements

mainContent.title: About Us
mainContent.description: Established with a vision to empower rural youth, Sant Singaji Engineering College (SSEC) offers cutting-edge technical education in Computer Science and IT. We focus on innovation, practical skills, and industry readiness.
mainContent.mission: To deliver industry-aligned technical education that empowers rural youth with the skills and mindset needed for success in the digital age.
mainContent.vision: To be a leading institution fostering innovation, research, and entrepreneurship in Computer Science and IT for sustainable global impact.

timeline.title: College Established
timeline.description: Founded to provide quality higher education in a rural region.

timeline.title: First Batch Graduated
timeline.description: Celebrated the graduation of the first batch of students.

timeline.title: 1,000 Graduates Milestone
timeline.description: Crossed the milestone of 1,000 students successfully graduating.

timeline.title: 1,000+ Placements Achieved
timeline.description: Achieved over 1,000 student placements in reputed companies.

timeline.title: Launch of Engineering College
timeline.description: Established the first engineering college within a 100 km radius, dedicated to CS and IT excellence.

facilities.title: Advanced Computer Lab
facilities.description: Fully-equipped computer labs with high-speed internet and modern systems for hands-on technical learning.

facilities.title: Live Industry Projects
facilities.description: Students work on real-world software projects in collaboration with multiple companies, gaining practical experience.

facilities.title: Expert Mentorship
facilities.description: Guidance and training by professionals from Microsoft, SAP, Infosys, Incher, Capgemini, and TCS to bridge the gap between education and industry.

facilities.title: Sports Facilities
facilities.description: Well-maintained sports infrastructure supporting both indoor and outdoor games for holistic student development.
